CustomField.description: This field exists purely to provide a relationship between "In_Village_Brand_Activity__c" - Account - "Marketing_Activity__c", this allows the related marketing Activty to be shown on the Account layout in a related list. It is populated by a process builder workflow - "In Village Brand Activity Set Brand__c", a process invoked by insert or update of an "In_Village_Brand_Activity__c" record.
CustomField.label: Brand
